extracted_information: Among Us is a party game developed by Innersloth, who are also the creators of The Henry Stickmin Collection. The game focuses on teamwork and betrayal, where players (Crewmates) attempt to hold their spaceship together while identifying and ejecting Impostors. Impostors, hidden among the Crewmates, aim to kill everyone onboard. It supports 4-15 players online or via local WiFi.

details: Fill the group task bar or eject the Impostors.
Complete all tasks or eject Impostors to win.
Call emergency meetings if dead bodies or suspicious behavior are seen.
Check the Admin map and Security cameras to keep tabs on other Crewmates.
React quickly to undo the Impostor’s sabotages.
Have an alibi ready in case of false accusation.
Kill Crewmates and frame innocent bystanders.
Pretend to do tasks to blend in with the Crewmates.
Sneak through the vents to quickly move around.
Sabotage tasks to cause chaos and confuse the crew.
Close doors to trap victims and kill in private.
Do everything possible to convince the crew of your innocence.
